title: Samson’s Vengeance on the Philistines
summary: In Judges 15, Samson returns to his wife but finds she’s been given to another. In revenge, he burns the Philistines’ fields with foxes, defeats them in battle, and kills 1,000 men with a donkey’s jawbone.

faq.question: What caused Samson’s rage in this chapter?
faq.answer: His wife was given to someone else, which enraged him.

faq.question: What unusual weapon did Samson use?
faq.answer: A donkey’s jawbone to kill 1,000 Philistines.
